verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron.

verses.kjv: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When any man hath a running issue out of his flesh, because of his issue he is unclean.
verses.web: “Speak to the children of Israel, and tell them, ‘When any man has a discharge from his body, because of his discharge he is unclean.
verses.ct: "Tell the people of Israel: When a man has an abnormal bodily discharge, that discharge makes him unclean.

verses.kjv: And this shall be his uncleanness in his issue: whether his flesh run with his issue, or his flesh be stopped from his issue, it is his uncleanness.
verses.web: This shall be his uncleanness in his discharge: whether his body runs with his discharge, or his body has stopped from his discharge, it is his uncleanness.
verses.ct: This is how his discharge makes him unclean — whether it keeps flowing from his body or has stopped up, he remains unclean.

verses.kjv: Every bed, whereon he lieth that hath the issue, is unclean: and every thing, whereon he sitteth, shall be unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘Every bed on which he who has the discharge lies shall be unclean; and everything he sits on shall be unclean.
verses.ct: Any bed the man with the discharge lies on becomes unclean, and anything he sits on becomes unclean.

verses.kjv: And whosoever toucheth his bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Whoever touches his bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches his bed must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And he that sitteth on any thing whereon he sat that hath the issue shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: He who sits on anything on which the man who has the discharge sat shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who sits on something the man with the discharge sat on must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And he that toucheth the flesh of him that hath the issue shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: “ ‘He who touches the body of him who has the discharge shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches the body of the man with the discharge must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And if he that hath the issue spit upon him that is clean; then he shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: “ ‘If he who has the discharge spits on him who is clean, then he shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: If the man with the discharge spits on someone who is clean, that person must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And what saddle soever he rideth upon that hath the issue shall be unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘Whatever saddle he who has the discharge rides on shall be unclean.
verses.ct: Any saddle the man with the discharge rides on becomes unclean.

verses.kjv: And whosoever toucheth any thing that was under him shall be unclean until the even: and he that beareth any of those things shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Whoever touches anything that was under him shall be unclean until the evening. He who carries those things shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches anything that was beneath him will be unclean until evening. Anyone who carries any of those items must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And whomsoever he toucheth that hath the issue, and hath not rinsed his hands in water, he shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: “ ‘Whomever he who has the discharge touches, without having rinsed his hands in water, he shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: If the man with the discharge touches someone without first rinsing his hands in water, that person must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And the vessel of earth, that he toucheth which hath the issue, shall be broken: and every vessel of wood shall be rinsed in water.
verses.web: “ ‘The earthen vessel, which he who has the discharge touches, shall be broken; and every vessel of wood shall be rinsed in water.
verses.ct: Any clay pot the man with the discharge touches must be smashed. Any wooden container he touches must be rinsed with water.

verses.kjv: And when he that hath an issue is cleansed of his issue; then he shall number to himself seven days for his cleansing, and wash his clothes, and bathe his flesh in running water, and shall be clean.
verses.web: “ ‘When he who has a discharge is cleansed of his discharge, then he shall count to himself seven days for his cleansing, and wash his clothes; and he shall bathe his flesh in running water, and shall be clean.
verses.ct: When the man is healed of his discharge, he must count off 7 days for his cleansing. Then he must wash his clothes and bathe his body in fresh running water, and he will be clean.

verses.kjv: And on the eighth day he shall take to him two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, and come before the LORD unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and give them unto the priest:
verses.web: “ ‘On the eighth day he shall take two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, and come before LORD to the door of the Tent of Meeting, and give them to the priest.
verses.ct: On the 8th day, he must take 2 turtledoves or 2 young pigeons and come before the LORD at the entrance of the tabernacle, and give them to the priest.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall offer them, the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make an atonement for him before the LORD for his issue.
verses.web: The priest shall offer them, the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering. The priest shall make atonement for him before LORD for his discharge.
verses.ct: The priest will sacrifice one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering. In this way, the priest will make atonement for the man before the LORD because of his discharge.

verses.kjv: And if any man’s seed of copulation go out from him, then he shall wash all his flesh in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: “ ‘If any man has an emission of semen, then he shall bathe all his flesh in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: When a man has an emission of semen, he must bathe his whole body in water and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And every garment, and every skin, whereon is the seed of copulation, shall be washed with water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Every garment and every skin which the semen is on shall be washed with water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Any clothing or leather that the semen gets on must be washed with water and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: The woman also with whom man shall lie with seed of copulation, they shall both bathe themselves in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: If a man lies with a woman and there is an emission of semen, they shall both bathe themselves in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: When a man sleeps with a woman and there is an emission of semen, both of them must bathe in water and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And if a woman have an issue, and her issue in her flesh be blood, she shall be put apart seven days: and whosoever toucheth her shall be unclean until the even.
verses.web: “ ‘If a woman has a discharge, and her discharge in her flesh is blood, she shall be in her impurity seven days. Whoever touches her shall be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: When a woman has her regular period, she will be in a state of uncleanness for 7 days. Anyone who touches her will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And every thing that she lieth upon in her separation shall be unclean: every thing also that she sitteth upon shall be unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘Everything that she lies on in her impurity shall be unclean. Everything also that she sits on shall be unclean.
verses.ct: Anything she lies on during her period becomes unclean, and anything she sits on becomes unclean.

verses.kjv: And whosoever toucheth her bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Whoever touches her bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches her bed must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And whosoever toucheth any thing that she sat upon shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Whoever touches anything that she sits on shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches anything she has sat on must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And if it be on her bed, or on any thing whereon she sitteth, when he toucheth it, he shall be unclean until the even.
verses.web: If it is on the bed, or on anything she sits on, when he touches it, he shall be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Whether it's her bed or anything she has been sitting on, whoever touches it will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: And if any man lie with her at all, and her flowers be upon him, he shall be unclean seven days; and all the bed whereon he lieth shall be unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘If any man lies with her, and her monthly flow is on him, he shall be unclean seven days; and every bed he lies on shall be unclean.
verses.ct: If a man sleeps with her and her menstrual blood gets on him, he will be unclean for 7 days, and any bed he lies on will become unclean.

verses.kjv: And if a woman have an issue of her blood many days out of the time of her separation, or if it run beyond the time of her separation; all the days of the issue of her uncleanness shall be as the days of her separation: she shall be unclean.
verses.web: “ ‘If a woman has a discharge of her blood many days not in the time of her period, or if she has a discharge beyond the time of her period, all the days of the discharge of her uncleanness shall be as in the days of her period. She is unclean.
verses.ct: If a woman has a flow of blood for many days outside her regular period, or if her bleeding continues beyond her normal time, she remains unclean for as long as the discharge lasts — just as she would be during her regular period.

verses.kjv: Every bed whereon she lieth all the days of her issue shall be unto her as the bed of her separation: and whatsoever she sitteth upon shall be unclean, as the uncleanness of her separation.
verses.web: Every bed she lies on all the days of her discharge shall be to her as the bed of her period. Everything she sits on shall be unclean, as the uncleanness of her period.
verses.ct: Any bed she lies on during this extended discharge is treated the same as her bed during her period. Anything she sits on becomes unclean, just as it would during her regular period.

verses.kjv: And whosoever toucheth those things shall be unclean, and shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
verses.web: Whoever touches these things shall be unclean, and shall wash his clothes and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the evening.
verses.ct: Anyone who touches these things becomes unclean. They must wash their clothes, bathe in water, and will be unclean until evening.

verses.kjv: But if she be cleansed of her issue, then she shall number to herself seven days, and after that she shall be clean.
verses.web: “ ‘But if she is cleansed of her discharge, then she shall count to herself seven days, and after that she shall be clean.
verses.ct: Once she is healed of her discharge, she must count off 7 days, and after that she will be clean.

verses.kjv: And on the eighth day she shall take unto her two turtles, or two young pigeons, and bring them unto the priest, to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: On the eighth day she shall take two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, and bring them to the priest, to the door of the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: On the 8th day, she must take 2 turtledoves or 2 young pigeons and bring them to the priest at the entrance of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall offer the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make an atonement for her before the LORD for the issue of her uncleanness.
verses.web: The priest shall offer the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make atonement for her before LORD for the uncleanness of her discharge.
verses.ct: The priest will sacrifice one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering. In this way, the priest will make atonement for her before the LORD because of her unclean discharge.

verses.kjv: Thus shall ye separate the children of Israel from their uncleanness; that they die not in their uncleanness, when they defile my tabernacle that is among them.
verses.web: “ ‘Thus you shall separate the children of Israel from their uncleanness, so they will not die in their uncleanness when they defile my tabernacle that is among them.’ ”
verses.ct: You must keep the people of Israel separate from things that make them unclean. Otherwise, they will die in their uncleanness by defiling my tabernacle that stands among them."

verses.kjv: This is the law of him that hath an issue, and of him whose seed goeth from him, and is defiled therewith;
verses.web: This is the law of him who has a discharge, and of him who has an emission of semen, so that he is unclean by it;
verses.ct: These are the instructions for a man who has an abnormal discharge, or who becomes unclean through an emission of semen,

verses.kjv: And of her that is sick of her flowers, and of him that hath an issue, of the man, and of the woman, and of him that lieth with her that is unclean.
verses.web: and of her who has her period, and of a man or woman who has a discharge, and of him who lies with her who is unclean.
verses.ct: and for a woman during her period, and for any man or woman who has a discharge, and for a man who sleeps with a woman who is unclean.
